info.title: SystemLink User Data Service
info.description: API for creating and storing data associated with a user.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many user data items to skip in the result when paging. For example, a list of 100 user data items with a skip value of 50 and a take value of 25 will return entries 51 through 75.

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: How many user data items to return in the result. For example, a list of 100 user data items with a skip value of 50 and a take value of 25 will return entries 51 through 75.

post.summary: Updates one or more user data items.
Deletes multiple user data items in a single API call.

get.summary: Get all the visible the user data items.
get.description:
The user only has access to its own items at this end point. For read-only access to items marked as visisble to others
in the same organization then use the `query-items` end-point.
Use the skip and take parameters to return paged responses.
The orderBy and orderByDescending fields can be used to manage sorting the list by specific fields.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many user data items to skip in the result when paging. For example, a list of 100 user data items with a skip value of 50 and a take value of 25 will return entries 51 through 75.

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: How many user data items to return in the result. For example, a list of 100 user data items with a skip value of 50 and a take value of 25 will return entries 51 through 75.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The name of the field to sort by.
            
Available values : ID, USER, APPLICATION, CATEGORY, NAME, VISIBLE_TO_OTHERS, REVISION, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT

parameters.name: OrderByDescending
parameters.description:
Whether to sort descending instead of ascending. The elements in the list are sorted ascending by default. If the orderByDescending parameter is specified,
the elements in the list are sorted based on its value. The orderByDescending value must be a boolean string. The elements in the list are sorted ascending if false and descending if true.

post.summary: Creates or updates one or more user data items.

get.summary: Get information about the specified user data item.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified user data item.

get.summary: Returns whether the service is running.

CreateOrUpdateUserDataItemRequestModel.title: Create or Update User Data Item Request

application.description: Gets or sets the application name that this user data item belongs to.

category.description: Gets or sets the category name in the application that this user data item belongs to. An empty category name is accepted.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the user data item.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the user data item.

visibleToOthers.description: Gets or sets whether this user data item is visible to other users. This will allow other users to query this data.

expectedRevision.description: Gets or sets this is an optional value.

CreateOrUpdateUserDataItemRequestModel.description: Model to request to create or update a user data item.

CreateOrUpdateUserDataItemResponseModel.title: Create or Update User Data Item Response

succeeded.description: Gets or sets array of user data items that were created or updated.

failed.description: Gets or sets array of user data item create or update requests that failed.

CreateOrUpdateUserDataItemResponseModel.description: Response model for a create or update user data item request.

operation.description:
Gets or sets query operation enum. Note that 'LESS_THAN', 'GREATER_THAN', 'LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL', and 'GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL'
are only supported when the data type of the comparison is a string, ISO date time, or numeric value. These are not supported
on booleans, arrays, or objects (also known as dictionaries).

comparisonValue.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp value to compare.

DeleteUserDataItemsResponseModel.title: Delete User Data Items Response

succeeded.description: Gets or sets array of user data item IDs that were successfully deleted.

failed.description: Gets or sets array of user data item IDs that failed to delete.

DeleteUserDataItemsResponseModel.description: Model for delete user data items partial success response.

GetUserDataItemsResponseModel.title: Get User Data Items Response

items.description: Gets or sets array of user data items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets number of matching user data items.

GetUserDataItemsResponseModel.description: Model for user data item information.

operation.description:
Gets or sets query operation enum. Note that 'LESS_THAN', 'GREATER_THAN', 'LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL', and 'GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL'
are only supported when the data type of the comparison is a string, ISO date time, or numeric value. These are not supported
on booleans, arrays, or objects (also known as dictionaries).

comparisonValue.description: Gets or sets integer value to compare.

JsonQueryObjectModel.title: JSON Query Object

operation.description:
Gets or sets query operation enum. Note that 'LESS_THAN', 'GREATER_THAN', 'LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL', and 'GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL'
are only supported when the data type of the comparison is a string, ISO date time, or numeric value. These are not supported
on booleans, arrays, or objects (also known as dictionaries).

comparisonValue.description: Gets or sets value to compare. This can be any valid JSON type. The type of this must match the type of the data being compared to.

JsonQueryObjectModel.description: Model for JSON query object. This is used when querying a field that can be any valid JSON type.

OperationAvailability.title: Operation Availability

available.description: Gets whether the endpoint is available.

version.description: Gets the supported API version for this endpoint.

OperationAvailability.description: This record struct defines the availability and version of a given operation.

QueryUserDataItemRequestModel.title: Query User Data Items Request

ids.description: Gets or sets array of user data item IDs.

applications.description: Gets or sets array of application names.

categories.description: Gets or sets array of category names.

names.description: Gets or sets array of user data item names.

valueQuery.description: Gets or sets array of JSON query objects to query against the values of the user data items.

visibleToOthers.description: Gets or sets match against the 'visibleToOthers' field in the user item data. If not set, will match both true and false values.

revisionQuery.description: Gets or sets array of integer query objects used to query the revision of the user data items.

createdAtQuery.description: Gets or sets array of time query objects used to query when the user data items were created.

updatedAtQuery.description: Gets or sets array of time query objects used to query when the user data items were last updated.

sortBy.description: Gets or sets array of user data item sort definition objects to define how to sort the results.

items.description: Model for user data item field enum.

projection.description:
Gets or sets array of user data item fields. If you specify an array, the query returns a result with the user data items
containing the fields that are both specified and available. If you do not specify an array, the query will return a result
with the user data items containing all available fields.

QueryUserDataItemRequestModel.description: Model for requesting a user data item query.

RootEndpointResponseModel.title: Root Endpoint Response
RootEndpointResponseModel.description: This record defines the response model for the root, niuserdata endpoint.

SortDefinitionObjectModel.title: Sort Definition Object

field.description: Gets or sets user data item sort field enum.

orderByDescending.description:
Gets or sets whether to sort descending instead of ascending. The elements in the list are sorted ascending by default.
If the orderByDescending parameter is specified, the elements in the list are sorted based on its value. The orderByDescending
value must be a boolean string. The elements in the list are sorted ascending if false and descending if true.

SortDefinitionObjectModel.description: Model for defining the field and direction for sorting user data items.

UpdateUserDataItemRequestModel.title: Update User Data Item Request

id.description: Gets or sets the ID for this user data item.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the user data item.

visibleToOthers.description: Gets or sets whether this user data item is visible to other users. This will allow other users to query this data.

expectedRevision.description: Gets or sets this is an optional value. When specified, this is an integer that should be set to match the last known revision number of the user data item. If it doesn't match at the time of execution, the update request will be rejected. This is used to ensure that changes to this user data item are correctly using the previous state. This may be important, for instance, in the case where multiple clients are updating an array value at the same time.

UpdateUserDataItemRequestModel.description: Model for a user data item update request.

UpdateUserDataItemResponseModel.title: Update User Data Item Response

succeeded.description: Gets or sets array of user data item IDs that were updated.

failed.description: Gets or sets array of user data item update requests that failed.

UpdateUserDataItemResponseModel.description: Model for the update user data items partial success response.

UserDataItemModel.title: User Data Item

id.description: Gets or sets the ID for this user data item.

user.description: Gets or sets the user that this data item belongs to.

application.description: Gets or sets the application name that this user data item belongs to.

category.description: Gets or sets the category name in the application that this user data item belongs to. An empty category name is accepted.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the user data item.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the user data item.

visibleToOthers.description: Gets or sets whether this user data item is visible to other users. This will allow other users to query this data.

revision.description:
Gets or sets the revision number for this user data item. When a user data item is created, the revision number starts at 1.
Every time it is updated, the revision number is incremented by 1.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying when the user data item was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying when the user data item was last updated.

UserDataItemModel.description: Model for information about a specific user data item.

V1OperationsModel.title: V1 Operations

operations.description: Gets the supported Operations for this endpoint.

V1OperationsModel.description: This record defines the operations model for the v1 endpoint.

tags.description: The root end point for the API.

tags.name: V1Endpoint
tags.description: The root V1 end point for the API.

tags.name: Items
tags.description: Create or update items, get all items for a user, get an item by ID or delete an item by ID.

tags.name: ItemBatchOperations
tags.description: Perform query, update and delete batch operations.
